actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that standards of identity for milk include certain minimum standards regarding milk solids, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Healthier Milk Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to mandate standards of identity for milk in final package form for beverage use.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that standards of identity for milk include certain minimum standards regarding milk solids, and for other purposes.
